In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities refer to the specific techniques and materials used in the process of observing the morphologies of the polymers and PC71BM blend films. These entities include "tapping - mode," which refers to a specific mode of operation in atomic force microscopy, "atomic force microscopy ( AFM )," which is a type of microscopy used to observe the morphologies of materials, and "PC71BM blend films," which are the specific materials being observed.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Value of material property" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Property Value".

In this paragraph, the "Property Value" entities that refer to the value of material properties are "tapping - mode" and "PC71BM blend films". "Tapping - mode" is a specific mode of operation in atomic force microscopy, which is a technique used to measure material properties such as surface roughness and elasticity. "PC71BM blend films" are the specific materials being observed, and their morphologies provide information about their material properties.
